name: Pool Cleaner In Space VR
description: You are boB, a pool cleaner who has few life skills with the exception that he can clean pools remarkably well. boB, while on the way to clean the pool, will have problems arise that are going to prevent him from cleaning the pool. You will be playing in a zero gravity environment that allows for full interaction. This means you can choose to ignore the objectives at hand and just play around with the environment, or you can instead continue to progress through the story.
